pageProduct.name: Palmers Skin Success Dark Spot Corrector Fade Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Skin Success Dark Spot Corrector is a lightweight serum which visibly improves dark spots, age spots, post-acne scars and uneven skin tone.

Palmer's® Skin Success Dark Spot Corrector is an effective concentrate of skin-balancing ingredients that brighten and correct dark spots, post-acne scars, sun damage and uneven skin tone. Infused with natural skin brighteners Niacinamide, Vitamin C, Japanese Songyi Mushroom Extract and anti-ageing powerhouse Retinol to improve radiance and help minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Niacinamide targets dark spots and uneven discolouration, Retinol improves fine lines and boosts collagen, and Vitamin C brightens complexion and evens skin tone. Palmer's Skin Success targets areas of hyperpigmentation and uneven tone caused by scars, skin trauma or sun damage and helps return them to the same tone as the rest of the complexion. This means the range is suitable for any skin tone and type, and promotes healthy, youthful and even toned skin.

Suitable For: All skin types.

Product Claims: Corrects dark spots and evens skin tone

Size: 30mL

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Visibly improves dark spots, age spots, post-acne scars and uneven skin tone.
• Vegan
• Free of parabens, mineral oil and dyes
• For all skin types and tones
• Hypoallergenic
• Dermatologist Tested
• Free from hydroquinone

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains Retinol that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and increase the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing and limit sun exposure while using this product.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Niacinamide, Glycerin, Sodium Polycrylate, Trilaureth-4 Phosphate, Butylene Glycol, Fragrance (Parfum), Tricholoma Matsutake Extract, Hexylresorcinol, Retinol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit/Leaf Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Citric Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Titanium Dioxide (CI77891), Mica, Caramel, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Sulfite, Sodium Benzoate, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexylglycerin BHT, Potassium Sorbate, Propylene Glycol,Phenoxyethanol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl lonone.

Contains: Niacinamide, Retinol, Hexylresorcinol, Songyi Mushroom Extract, Vitamin C, Licorice Extract, Lemon Extract

Directions

Use twice daily. AM and PM on clean, dry skin. Dispense 1-2 pumps and apply a thin layer of serum all over your face and neck. Follow with sunscreen.

USAGE ADVICE

Patch test first to assess skin sensitivity. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.
